title: Kylie Jenner and Travis Scott spark reunion rumours as he moves back into her LA mansion
text:
The video will start in 8 Cancel

Get the biggest celebs stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Kylie Jenner and Travis Scott are reportedly back living together following their recent split.

The parents of one-year-old Stormi have been spending time together again as Travis, 28, moved back into Kylie's home in Calabasas.

The rapper dislocated his knee after falling on stage, and Kylie, 22, is allegedly helping him to recover.

(Image: DPA/PA Images)

A source told TMZ that when Travis isn't at that house, he's at the house they shared together in Beverly Hills.

The source added that the pair are maintaining a friendship as they co parent their daughter, and will be spending even more time together as the festive season begins.

Kylie and Travis recently took Stormi on an adorable day out to a pumpkin patch, although they took separate photos with the tot and none with each others.

(Image: SplashNews.com)

The source also told TMZ they intend to celebrate Thanksgiving and Christmas together as a family, and to keep the whole family united at other events and parties.

They also revealed Kylie and Travis' friends think they will get back together by the end of the year.

The exes shared a cheeky social media exchange on Thursday.

It started heating up after the mother-of-one uploaded a video of their daughter Stormi dancing to her morning lullaby Rise & Shine.

(Image: Instagram)

"Daddy’s girl." She captioned the video.

In the clip, Kylie gushed her little girl was a "daddy's girl", as Stormi was listening to Kylie singing but requested to hear her dad sing instead.

"Daddy sing," Stormi begged.

She replied: "No baby that's mummy. That's mummy sing... Oh you want daddy singing? I'm not good enough."

(Image: Instagram)

Travis commented within half an hour with a heart emoji. He wrote: "Wild."

Their split was marred with rumours the rapper cheated on the Kardashian with model Rojean Kar.

Both Rojean and Travis have denied the claims they were in a relationship while he was with Kylie.
description: The couple are reportedly living together again as they co parent their daughter Stormi
